Title: Consequences
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Courtney Kemp Agboh, Safia Dirie (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Ghost picks up the pieces at Truth after the botched murder attempt against him, while recommitting to the drug game. Tommy disappears after learning Angela is with the feds.
